name: The Great Gatsby
description: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald about love, wealth, and the American Dream.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee's timeless story of courage, morality, and justice in the American South.
George Orwell's dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: Yuval Noah Harari's exploration of human history, from evolution to modern society.

name: The Alchemist
description: Paulo Coelho's inspiring story of a shepherd's journey to follow his dreams.

name: Becoming
description: Michelle Obama's memoir about her journey from Chicago to the White House.

name: Atomic Habits
description: James Clear's guide on how to build good habits and break bad ones.

name: Educated
description: Tara Westover's memoir about overcoming an abusive upbringing to pursue education.

name: The Power of Now
description: Eckhart Tolle's guide to living in the present and finding peace.

name: A Brief History of Time
description: Stephen Hawking's exploration of time, space, and the universe.
